Articles.Content:
Is in reality a giant bat that punches everyone who forgets to post the next building  (I'm forgetting everything, sorry )

The Circus Maximus…

Ain't a Maximus...

...The alien base in the dark side of the moon has a disco in which...

EVERYBODY PARTYS!!! 

The Roman forums...

...are actually the Kerbal Space Program forums.

 

The building is a geostationary production facility...

Which is actually the HQ of a company that makes money gluing rocks to things.

The White House is...

...Now Black house.

The Chernobyl Nuclear Power Plant is...

Abandoned because of radiation and stuff...

The Mars city HQ...

is on Venus

The runway...

Now use like a route.

The sanctuary

...has a DJ playing death metal

The interstellar police station...

Is fully controled by criminals

The jool station...

...is now the Dres station. 

The R&D wind tunnel...

Designed to simulate re-entry conditions, often gets used as a popcorn maker.

 

That bamboo bicycle factory...

(actualy a really clever idea : Ghana bamboo bikes)

Edited May 5, 2016 by SinBad
added interesting link

...is on fire because of a random smoking employee.

The secret underground facility...

...was built wrong and is floating in the sky.

This secret underground facility floating in the sky...

Is actually not secret at all, has a Facebook and Twitter page, and GPS receivers and a website where you can track it's its location as it floats around on balloons.

The car factory...

Produces rockets.

This car factory that actually produces rockets...

And sells them to the not secret underground sky base employees to have as pets.

 

This server farm...

...Actually grows servers.

 

This obsidian monolith engraved with an infinite number of backslashes*...

 

 

* http://xkcd.com/1638/

...was destroyed by diamond pickaxes for being too old.

The DFC(Dres Fried Chicken).....

...Is out of business since it's on dres and nobody would go there just for fried chicken.

 

This tear in the fabric of space-time...

...is being mended by a Nyan cat with a celestial needle and a string wound from the protoplanetary accretion discs of newborn stars.

The tree house...

Now secret bunker.

Lunar reactor is...

...covering the entire surface of the Moon and suffering a breach, making it appear to be a star for a brief period of time. (It was a fusion reactor)

The SETI building...

Has a switch called "mute audio" hidden inside a wall. It was installed activated by the rigelians and is super glued in the mute position.

 

This full scale museum replica of the iss...
